title: Blacksmith
name: Gus
summary: The Blacksmith is a jovial man with a heart as warm as his forge. Known for his craftsmanship and friendly demeanor, he is always ready with a old tale and a well-crafted piece of metalwork.
history: Born and raised in the Hamlet, Gus learned the trade from his father. His natural talent and passion for metalworking, combined with his amiable nature, have made him a beloved figure in the community.

clothing.top: Sleeveless tan shirt under a thick leather apron

notes: Always has his pipe with him, even while working
Strength belies his age - can easily wield his massive hammer
Enjoys sharing stories of his craft with customers and apprentices alike
Often settles disputes among villagers with his calm, friendly demeanor
